town_halls.title: ERA Town Hall Meeting
town_halls.summary:
*Meeting with Enabling The Future*

# ERA Town Hall Meeting

**Date:** January 03, 2024 | **Duration:** 120 mins

**Links:** [View Meeting](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=view_recording_link&utm_medium=email) | [Ask Fathom](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=ask_fathom&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=ask_fathom&utm_medium=email)

## ACTION ITEMS ✨

- [ ] [Send Panama project proposal draft to Mitch, Steve, and Ali for input](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=1490.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Subscribe to ERA's social media channels](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=1728.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Create Google group for eco-spiritual alliance project](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=3871.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Connect w/ Charlie Shore re: collaboration on Big Map to Save the Future & GoGreenLocally mapping](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=6031.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Explore data sharing options (e.g. Google Sheets) between ERA map and GoGreenLocally for cross-promotion](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=6068.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Research Panama for potential PSKL tech application, provide input for project proposal](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=6460.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Research passive house & living building challenge orgs (links from Christopher Haines)](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=6902.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)
- [ ] [Connect w/ Russ Speer re: potential water management projects in Pakistan](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=7024.9999&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=action_item&utm_medium=email)


## Meeting Purpose

## Key Takeaways

- [ERA received an anonymous $5,000 donation, with the membership to decide how to allocate funds](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=656.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [New initiatives discussed: church certification program for eco-restoration, Panama project proposal, and expansion of local eco-action tours](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=630.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Emphasis on collaboration and resource sharing among members to increase collective impact](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=1727.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Growing momentum in eco-restoration efforts globally, despite challenges](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=6556.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Topics

### Member Rights and Responsibilities

- [New document outlines rights: participation in meetings, voting, forum access](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=660.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Responsibilities include annual updates, social media engagement, accurate representation of ERA](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=761.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### New Member Introductions

- [Cassandra Kiki Ami: Ecosystem restoration expert from Pacific Northwest, focus on wildfire mitigation](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=921.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Mitch Rawlyk: Climatologist and permaculture practitioner from Alberta, Canada, developing software tools for permaculture design](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=3921.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Project Updates

- [Katrina Jeffries: Progress on desertification projects in Senegal, including tree nurseries and well construction](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=1793.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Ron Whitehurst: Initiatives to eliminate toxic pesticides in California, transition to organic farming](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=1598.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### PSKL Water Technology Presentation

- [Steve Boniwell and Ali Bin Shahid presented innovative water pumping and distribution system](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=4386.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Technology uses minimal elevation difference to pump water without external power](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=4509.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Potential applications for large-scale landscape regeneration and water cycle restoration](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=4556.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Cosmic Labyrinth Initiative

- [Indy Rishi Singh and team presented on experiential learning and eco-restoration events](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=2467.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Proposed certification program for churches to implement eco-friendly practices and community engagement](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=3502.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Go Green Locally Project

- [Jenny Nichols presented online platform showcasing local eco-action opportunities across 20 U.S. cities](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=5707.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Interactive tours highlight volunteering, nature preserves, and environmental organizations](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=5760.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


### Collaboration Opportunities

- [Discussion on integrating various mapping and database efforts (ERA, Go Green Locally, Big Map to Save the Future)](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=6023.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Exploration of potential partnerships with established organizations like U.S. Green Building Council](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=6862.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)


## Next Steps

- [Members to review and provide input on Panama project proposal](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=6477.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Explore creation of shared database/spreadsheet format for cross-promotion of initiatives](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=6105.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Consider submission of ideas for allocation of $5,000 donation to ERA fund](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=6362.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Follow up on potential collaborations discussed (e.g., mapping projects, church certification program)](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=6285.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
- [Next meeting scheduled in two weeks, with rotating time slot](https://fathom.video/share/prtrQa1FGKVAbWVzVEd3gyvh94V9g9Ay?tab=summary&timestamp=7120.0&utm_campaign=postmeetingsummary&utm_content=summary_item&utm_medium=email)
